mapper.update: update attend set attend_endTime=#{attend_endTime}, attend_stateNo=#{attend_stateNo} WHERE TO_CHAR(attend_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND emp_no=#{emp_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select /*+index_desc(a XPKATTEND) */ rownum rn, a.emp_no, a.attend_date, e.emp_name, a.attend_startTime, a.attend_endTime, a.attend_stateNo from attend a, emp e where a.emp_no=e.emp_no and a.emp_no=#{emp_no} and to_char(attend_date, 'YYYY')=to_char(#{year}) and to_char(attend_date, 'MM')=to_char(#{month}) )
